feature_model.name: Derived
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Derived (f_Derived) :m Color (f_Color) :m ExteriorColor (f_ExteriorColor) :m Antenna (f_Antenna) :m InteriorColor (f_InteriorColor) :m Grade (f_Grade) :m Trim (f_Trim) :m Sienna (f_Sienna) :m Drive (f_Drive) :m ModelCode (f_ModelCode) :m Engine (f_Engine) :m PsgrCount (f_PsgrCount) :o Accessories (f_Accessories) :o Mud Flaps (f_Mud_Flaps) :o Floor Mats (f_Floor_Mats) :g [1, 1] : V6 (f_V6) : L4 (f_L4) :g [1, 1] : 5328 (f_5328) : 5312 (f_5312) :g [1, 1] : Pole (f_Pole) : In Glass (f_In_Glass) :g [1, 1] : 8PSGR (f_8PSGR) : 7PSGR (f_7PSGR) :g [1, 1] : Blizzard Pearl (f_Blizzard_Pearl) : Super White (f_Super_White) : Silver Sky Metallic (f_Silver_Sky_Metallic) :g [1, 1] : LE (f_LE) : Base (f_Base) : XLE (f_XLE) :o XLE Premium Package (f_XLE_Premium_Package) :o XLE Navigation Package (f_XLE_Navigation_Package) : SE (f_SE) : LTD (f_LTD) :g [1, 1] : 2Wd (f_2Wd) : AWD (f_AWD) :g [1, 1] : Bisc (f_Bisc) : Charcoal (f_Charcoal) : Gray (f_Gray)
